column4: Okay, I'm having a problem with partitioning my device. when I plug it in, it says that it can't read the superblock. Any way to rectify this problem? I don't mind formating it
i find when a harddrive or similar is really playing up, i just pipe some /dev/urandom on to it
my advice is: start a console, enter "man mplayer" and see if there's something about an audio device
but maybe i'm getting ahead of myself here. your usb/headset works for other things, right?
